assessments.status_rationale: The BLS Employment Situation report scheduled for 2025-10-03 was not released due to the federal shutdown (see MarketWatch: 'No jobs report on Friday...'), so the specified print cannot be verified as of today.
The Employment Situation release on 2025-10-03 did not occur amid the federal shutdown per today's coverage, so this print cannot be assessed.
With the 2025-10-03 jobs report delayed by the shutdown, there is no official BLS print to evaluate yet.
The U-6 figure would have been in the 2025-10-03 Employment Situation, which was not released due to the shutdown; outcome is unverifiable today.
ISM is a private release and not directly affected by the federal shutdown, but no value or report outcome appears in today's news; awaiting official print.
Deadline is 2025-10-31; today's news does not report a WTI settlement at or above $90.
Weekly EIA diesel updates run through 2025-11-15; no qualifying print is cited in today's news.
The August 2025 field production figure will appear in EIA Petroleum Supply Monthly by 2025-10-31; no result reported yet today.
No joint announcement or concurrent statements from Intel and AMD about AMD using Intel Foundry Services are reported in today's news.
There is no coverage of the 10-year TIPS yield hitting 1.80% or lower; window remains open until 2025-11-30.
